review: This highly touted device was extremely disappointing. There are only a few channels that it accesses. It is great if all you want do is watch Netflix, Amazon, and Hulu. But Roku is the same price and offers a greater variety of channels. One of my favorites on Roku is Acorn TV, which is all British shows, but Amazon does not have even this variety. I gave it to my daughter--I have no use for it.
author: Jeri Sutton Shores MA
